welcome:
Welcome, this bot can send an anonymous message to any public channel in any public team you are a part of.

Commands:

1. Send **/start** command to begin

2. send **/help** command to get info and steps in using the bot
help:
When you send a message to this bot, the bot routes the message to the channel you chose, in the channel, the bot sends the message on your behalf, so you remain anonymous.

Steps:

1. Send **/start** to view a list of teams

2. Choose a team from the list

3. Choose a channel from the list of channels in the chosen team

4. Type your message to the bot, and the bot sends the message to the chosen channel on your behalf.
